mapper.insert: insert into member (m_id, m_name, m_nickname, m_original, m_file, m_password, m_mbti, m_phone, m_address_no, m_address) values (#{m_id}, #{m_name}, #{m_nickname}, #{m_original}, #{m_file}, #{m_password}, #{m_mbti}, #{m_phone}, #{m_address_no}, #{m_address})
mapper.select: select m_mbti from member where m_id = #{m_id}
select m_nickname from member where m_id = #{m_id}
select nickname from mbti_nickname where mbti = (select m_mbti from member where m_id = #{m_id})
select substate from member where m_id = #{m_id}
